title: Stats arent loading or available and what not
body:
i have stats from may and before for draft pick, but none of my recent draft game are included in my stats
also cant access any of my friends stat pages they are all just blank loading pages
ive tried troubleshooting and uninstalling and all that jazz but it still isnt working right{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Edit - And from i what i recall this has been going on for a few months now...probably since last i played draft....i have not seen anyone elses stats actually load in a long while let alone have my stats update since may....so like plz help

Edit - Never mind were just being ignored about this problem [im not the only one](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/lxcnOIlN-statistics-in-player-profile-wont-update?show=flat)
